Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are ranting about issues that include upcoming budget projections; tax cuts; and welfare relief. The rental crisis is also discussed
column3: as is the inability of health promotion to illustrate their worth accurately. Some tweets direct their angst toward political figures and their policies. Others ruminate on the power and implications of seemingly dire economic decisions. These posts reflect the tensions and anxieties experienced by people impacted differently by economic policies.
